info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued December 23 at 7:36PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID ...The Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID has issued a Backcountry Avalanche Watch... * WHAT...Avalanche danger for the watch area may rise to High on Friday, December 24th. * WHERE...For the Cabinet, Purcell, and Northern Bitterroot Mountains of Northwest Montana. * WHEN...In effect until 7 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Heavy snowfall and wind may create widespread areas of unstable snow.
info.instruction: Very dangerous avalanche conditions may develop. Large avalanches may run long distances and into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain. Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
